definition: To cleanse or wash an object or fabric using water and soap or detergent, typically done to remove dirt, stains, or odors. This action is commonly performed on clothing, linens, or other washable items to maintain cleanliness and hygiene.

examples.english: I have to wash my laundry.

examples.german: Kannst du bitte die Wäsche aufhängen?
examples.english: Can you please hang up the laundry?

examples.german: Ich habe vergessen, die Wäsche aus der Maschine zu nehmen.
examples.english: I forgot to take the laundry out of the machine.

examples.german: Die Wäscheleine ist voll mit Wäsche.
examples.english: The clothesline is full of laundry.
